moves.name: Outrage
moves.description: The user rampages and attacks for two to three turns. It then becomes confused, however.

moves.name: Scratch
moves.description: Hard, pointed, and sharp claws rake the target to inflict damage.

moves.name: Leer
moves.description: The opposing team gains an intimidating leer with sharp eyes. The opposing team's Defense stats are reduced.

moves.name: Assurance
moves.description: If the target has already taken some damage in the same turn, this attack's power is doubled.

moves.name: Dragon Rage
moves.description: This attack hits the target with a shock wave of pure rage. This attack always inflicts 40 HP damage.

moves.name: Leer
moves.description: The opposing team gains an intimidating leer with sharp eyes. The opposing team's Defense stats are reduced.

moves.name: Assurance
moves.description: If the target has already taken some damage in the same turn, this attack's power is doubled.

moves.name: Dragon Rage
moves.description: This attack hits the target with a shock wave of pure rage. This attack always inflicts 40 HP damage.

moves.name: Dual Chop
moves.description: The user attacks its target by hitting it with brutal strikes. The target is hit twice in a row.

moves.name: Scary Face
moves.description: The user frightens the target with a scary face to harshly reduce its Speed stat.

moves.name: Slash
moves.description: The target is attacked with a slash of claws or blades. Critical hits land more easily.

moves.name: False Swipe
moves.description: A restrained attack that prevents the target from fainting. The target is left with at least 1 HP.

moves.name: Dragon Claw
moves.description: The user slashes the target with huge, sharp claws.

moves.name: Dragon Dance
moves.description: The user vigorously performs a mystic, powerful dance that boosts its Attack and Speed stats.

moves.name: Taunt
moves.description: The target is taunted into a rage that allows it to use only attack moves for three turns.

moves.name: Dragon Pulse
moves.description: The target is attacked with a shock wave generated by the user's gaping mouth.

moves.name: Swords Dance
moves.description: A frenetic dance to uplift the fighting spirit. It sharply raises the user's Attack stat.

moves.name: Guillotine
moves.description: A vicious, tearing attack with big pincers. The target will faint instantly if this attack hits.

moves.name: Outrage
moves.description: The user rampages and attacks for two to three turns. It then becomes confused, however.

moves.name: Giga Impact
moves.description: The user charges at the target using every bit of its power. The user must rest on the next turn.
